trends: There have been 23 other sightings in Concord
There were no other sightings in Concord on or around August 31st 1991
Summary: Red, blue, silvery white orbes appear over Merrimack Valley
divs: sighting detailsin september of 1991, i witnessed what became known in the local media as the concord lights. each morning(approx 6-7am) and each evening (approx 7-8pm), i witnessed these orbes hanging approximately 2500 ft above the valley floor over or near the merrimack river on the north side of concord , nh. my father, with whom i worked and carpooled also saw what i saw. in fact, several of my friends witnessed this event. after about 10 days to 2 weeks, the orbs disappeared. beginning a week after the event, rumours began circulating about non-descript men following\watch people around the concord. these rumours persisted until the end of october 1991. i didn't give this event another thought. i have a very good memory and i would not have forgotten this incredible event. beginning in 2004, i began to have a hazy recall of the concord lights. by 2005, i could recall with great clarity the events. i sent an information request to mufon, but was told there where no previous reports. i finally questioned both my father and my closest nh friend in 2007. neither man recalls these events.
